title: RAKE GRN
content:
(Remember vehicle must be invoiced from plant)


1. 1st go to /NYMB5TN and type receiving plant F016 then click on execute.
2. Download or export all data in excel sheet.
3. Now go to /NZSD46 hit enter and tick on inbound truck/rake details, and click on execute button.
4. Select plant here F016 and click Create button.
5. Paste here shipment number and truck number from previously downloaded from excel sheet, and then click on save button.
6. Now go to /NZSD_GRN_N type here delivery number from excel and click execute.
7. Paste here delivery number from excel book and click on execute button.
8. Type handling type "ZUNL" type quantity as you se on delivery number. type shipping "ZA"
9. Now select storage location "SA01 Salable stock" . type vehicle number as see on delivery number.
10.Type token/RR no "0" press enter and then click on Process button. Done
